entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Gogama
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:57 a.m. EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind northeast 20 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 14 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow or ice pellets. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening then periods of snow changing to periods of ice pellets mixed with snow overnight. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of freezing rain mixed with ice pellets. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of ice pellets mixed with snow changing to freezing rain mixed with ice pellets in the morning and ending late in the afternoon then cloudy. Risk of freezing rain. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 in the morning. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Rain showers or flurries. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Rain showers or flurries. Low minus 6. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Flurries. High minus 1. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 11. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High zero.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High zero. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 11. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Sunny. High 6.
entry.summary: Sunny. High 6. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 3. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 10.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High 10. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Cloudy periods. Low plus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 11.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High 11. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
